short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your drafting experience with real-time player forecasts, intuitive dashboard, and effortless management tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your drafting experience with real-time player forecasts, intuitive dashboard, and effortless management tools.

The chrome extension brings your draft picks from your favorite fantasy football drafting platforms real-time into a dashboard to help you dominate your draft with custom rankings, real-time pick predictions, position and player stats, intuitive UI, and positional runs detector to help you be in control the entire draft. After using it you will wonder how you ever drafted without it!

Currently supports Harris Football and FantasyPros import rankings.
Currently support ESPN and NFL.com drafting platforms.
